alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 06 at 4:06PM EDT until May 06 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Estill. In southeast Kentucky, Breathitt, Lee, Magoffin, Morgan, Owsley and Wolfe. * WHEN...Until 715 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.2 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen in the last 6 hours. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... West Liberty, Jackson, Salyersville, Beattyville, Campton, Booneville, Mason, Simpson, Henry, Lewis, Fincastle, Lane, Hollonville, Bethany, Pence, Vortex, Mary, Baptist, Landsaw and Paxton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
